li.text:
- Chthonic Tiefling - Abyssal Tiefling - Air Genasi - Earth Genasi - Fire Genasi - Water Genasi - Thri-kreen - Minotaur
Unlike the ones above, these ones won't spawn naturally. Events will be added in future updates for them to spawn through. - Deva - Planetar - Cambion
All of the icons used for the xenotypes in this are now available to use on custom xenotypes too.

Warforged are now included if you have Asimov (link at the top), they're self repairing and do not suffer many of the frailties that biological pawns have. You won't find them wandering the world, but you can find Heartstones on exotics traders and as a quest reward, allowing you to create them at the new Creation Forge which you can build at any time.
